title: Controlled Disclosure Protocol
description: Schema for digital attribution and verification.

tagline.description: Optional tagline embedded within the content.

signature.description: Base64 or hex-encoded signature of the content (and tagline).

hash.description: Optional hash (e.g., SHA-256) of the content for external verification.

version.description: The version of the CDP specification (e.g., '1.0.0')

date.description: Optional date for the CDP document (ISO 8601).

note.description: Optional note or annotation about this CDP instance.

signedBy.description: Optional identifier (name, entity) of the signer.
